property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your other creatures attack, you may tap this creature. If you do, untap the attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {KIZUNA} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may use one of your creature's Kizuna abilities.) type=plus|Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 2 of your shields into your hand. You can't use the shield trigger abilities of those shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, you may put a non-evolution Metallica that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone tapped.
